2.04.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> YouTubers are becoming 
 more and more popular. </font>

4.48.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> So much so that by the year 2030, </font>

10.04.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> In this series, I, Liam Williams, </font>

12.24.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> a man who requires 
 a 90-minute session of CBT </font>

14.76.text:
<font color="#FFFFFF"> every time he uses the internet,

<font color="#FFFFFF"> Each week, I'll be taking 
 a different challenge </font>

21.96.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> as I try to become more like them </font>

24.00.text: <font color="#FFFFFF"> and hopefully win a £10,000 prize. </font>

 only vlogs I watch are in Japanese. </font>
